scenario1.Subject: An immensely obese male athlete, approximately 40 years old, weighing over 500lbs, round spherical build, wearing a vibrant, neon-pink professional spandex wrestling unitard that is stretched to its absolute limit, sweat-drenched skin, bulging eyes, flushed red cheeks, intense expression of sheer determination, double chin ripples, wild receding hairline.
scenario1.Action: Attempting a professional olympic pole vault, caught in mid-air at the apex of the jump, the fiberglass pole is bent into an extreme, impossible 'U' shape and looks ready to shatter, his body is horizontal and overflowing over the bar, legs flailing comically.
scenario1.Scene: A crowded Olympic stadium at night, bright stadium floodlights creating dramatic lens flares, a shocked audience in the background blurring out, dust particles floating in the light beams.
scenario1.Style: 9:16 vertical aspect ratio, hyper-realistic photography, 8k resolution, wide angle lens, high shutter speed action shot, cinematic lighting.

scenario2.Subject: A gargantuan woman, roughly 60 years old, distinct pear-shaped body, wearing a tiny, flowery sun hat and a polka-dot dress that resembles a tent, oversized sunglasses reflecting the road, clutching the handlebars with massive fingers, joyful yet terrified facial expression, wind blowing back her jowls.
scenario2.Action: Riding a microscopic, child-sized electric scooter down a steep hill, knees are bent sharply outward to fit on the deck, the scooter's tires are flattened to the rim, sparks are flying furiously from the metal scraping the asphalt due to the weight.
scenario2.Scene: A steep San Francisco street, sunny afternoon, blurred motion lines indicating high speed, cars parked on the side looking small in comparison, bright blue sky.
scenario2.Style: 9:16 vertical aspect ratio, GoPro action cam perspective, fish-eye effect, vibrant saturation, dramatic contrast, unreal engine 5 render.

scenario3.Subject: An incredibly massive man with a hipster aesthetic, huge bushy beard, man-bun hairstyle, wearing tight yoga leggings and a tank top that exposes a massive belly, tattoos stretching over the skin, calm but straining face, veins popping on forehead.
scenario3.Action: Attempting a delicate one-handed yoga handstand, the entire body weight is balanced on one palm, the concrete floor beneath the hand is cracking and crumbling into a crater under the pressure, the other hand is holding a tiny espresso cup.
scenario3.Scene: A peaceful, high-end zen garden with bamboo and sand, soft morning mist, golden hour sunlight, contrasting the chaos of the cracking floor with the serenity of the background.
scenario3.Style: 9:16 vertical aspect ratio, macro photography details, depth of field focused on the sweating face and cracking floor, cinematic composition.

scenario4.Subject: A colossal tactical swat team member, distinct barrel chest and massive gut, wearing full tactical gear including a vest that barely closes, combat helmet with a strap digging into the chin, wearing aviator sunglasses, shouting commands, holding a tiny donut in one hand and a shield in the other.
scenario4.Action: Rappelling down the side of a glass skyscraper, but the rope is fraying visibly, the glass windows are shattering inward from the impact of his boots, he is swinging wildly like a wrecking ball.
scenario4.Scene: Side of a reflective modern skyscraper, reflection of the city skyline in the glass, shards of glass flying outwards, dramatic height perspective looking down at tiny traffic below.
scenario4.Style: 9:16 vertical aspect ratio, blockbuster action movie poster style, dynamic angle, high contrast, explosion in background, volumetric lighting.

scenario5.Subject: An excessively obese ballerina, male, pale skin, wearing a pristine white tutu and tights, ballet slippers that look like they are about to burst, serious artistic expression, arms gracefully raised above head.
scenario5.Action: Performing a 'Grand Jet√©' leap across a narrow gap between two apartment buildings, caught mid-flight, defying gravity, the building ledge he just jumped from is crumbling into debris, the landing spot looks too fragile.
scenario5.Scene: Urban rooftop setting at sunset, gritty brick textures, pigeons flying away in terror, warm orange backlight creating a silhouette effect around the massive edges of the subject.
scenario5.Style: 9:16 vertical aspect ratio, slow-motion capture aesthetic, dramatic shadows, surrealism, sharp focus, 4k detailed texture.
